column1: Villanueva de la Cañada is a municipality in the Community of Madrid
column2: Spain. Located 30 km north-west from Madrid
column3: the municipality covers an area of 34.92 km². Geographically
column4: it sits on a large plain
column5: in which there are several promontories
column6: on one of which is found the castle of Aulencia
column7: its main landmark. The ESA's European Space Astronomy Centre lies close to the former
column8: on the Guadarrama riverfront. Villafranca del Castillo
column9: a well-off urban area detached from the main nucleus
column10: is located within the municipal bounds. Villanueva de la Cañada hosts the main campus of the Alfonso X El Sabio University as well as the Aquópolis waterpark.

column1: == Geography ==
Villanueva de la Cañada is watered by the rivers Guadarrama and Aulencia
column2: as well as various streams. The latter joins eventually the Guadarrama
column3: which flows in turn into the Tajo.

column1: Geologically
column2: its limits form part of the depression of the Tajo and it is defined by the existence of many alluvial fields
column3: with an average elevation of 652 metres.

column1: It borders Valdemorillo and Villanueva del Pardillo to the North
column3: Boadilla del Monte and Villaviciosa de Odón to the East
column4: Brunete to the South and borders Quijorna to the West.

== Major roads ==
The municipal limits of Villanueva de la Cañada are crossed by the following major roads:
M-600: joining San Lorenzo de El Escorial with Navalcarnero;
M-503: joining Villanueva de la Cañada with the M-50 and M-500 (carretera de Castilla);
M-513: joining Brunete with the M-50
M-521: joining Villanueva de la Cañada with Quijorna.
== Public transport ==
Villanueva de la Cañada is connected by several coach lines:
530: Navalcarnero-Villanueva de la Cañada;
575: Boadilla del Monte-Brunete (via Guadamonte);
581: Madrid (intercambiador de Príncipe Pío)-Villaviciosa de Odón-Brunete- Villanueva de la Cañada-Quijorna;
623: Madrid (intercambiador de Moncloa)-Las Rozas de Madrid – Villafranca del Castillo;
626: Las Rozas de Madrid-Majadahonda-Villanueva de la Cañada;
627: Madrid (intercambiador de Moncloa)-Villanueva de la Cañada-Brunete;
669: San Lorenzo de El Escorial-Villanueva de la Cañada.
